title: User Login Flow
description: Test that users can successfully log in with seeded credentials
acceptance_criteria: Successfully redirected to dashboard after login

title: Meal Plan Generation
description: Test that users can generate a 7-day meal plan
acceptance_criteria: Verify 7 days of meals are displayed

title: Recipe View
description: Test that users can view recipe details
acceptance_criteria: Click on a meal from the plan

title: Shopping List Generation
description: Test that users can generate a shopping list from meal plan

title: User Logout
description: Test that users can successfully log out
acceptance_criteria: Cannot access protected pages after logout
